# <lazy-image\>


Lazily load your images


## ðŸ“¦ Load it!
```html
<!-- From CDN -->
<script async type="module" src="https://unpkg.com/@power-elements/lazy-image/lazy-image.js"></script>

<!-- From local installation -->

```

## ðŸ’ª Use it!
